altTitles.en: Why Did You Come To My Home

altTitles.pt-br: Por Que Você Veio Pra Minha Casa?

description.en:
Official Summary:  
The unfamiliar guy who appeared in front of Seo Jaehee, the office worker with a busy life. Remove prejudices against him!  
  
From MangaUpdates:  
Jade is told that her childhood friend from China is going to stay at her house. Yet, the grown man who arrives at her door is no longer the sweet boy from her distant memories, rather far from it. As she struggles to re-adjust to their new life together, will she rediscover her childhood crush or simply kick him to the curb?
description.pt-br: Jade fica sabendo que seu amigo de infância da China vai ficar na casa dela. Porém, o marmanjo que chega à sua porta não é mais o menino doce de suas lembranças distantes, mas sim distante disso. Enquanto ela luta para se reajustar à nova vida juntos, ela redescobrirá sua paixão de infância ou simplesmente o expulsará

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

description.en: JaeJu (which means “skill” in Korean) grew up without parents in an orphanage skillfully, just like his name suggests. One day, he heard that the orphanage was having a hard time and would have to close in 3 years. While trying to raise money for the orphanage, JaeJu got an alert on his phone. On it, he saw a video of himself climbing the tower as a BJ (broadcasting jockey aka streamer). Seven years ago, a tower suddenly appeared and randomly took people into it. If you successfully complete the tower and become an “Awakened”, it’s only a matter of time before you get rich!
description.ko:
부모님 없이 보육원에서 자란 재주
이름처럼 재주있게 살아가던 어느날
보육원이 어려워 3년 뒤 문을 닫게 된다는 이야기를 듣게 된다.

보육원을 위해 돈을 구해보려던 재주의 핸드폰에
갑작스럽게 알림이 울리고
핸드폰에서는 탑을 오르며 BJ가 되어있는 
자신의 영상이 재생된다.

7년 전, 갑작스럽게 세상에 나타나
무작위로 사람을 데려가는 탑.

이 탑에서 무사히 돌와 '각성자' 가 된다면
큰 돈을 버는 것은 시간 문제!

핸드폰에 영상을 보낸 것은 누구이며
재주는 무사히 탑을 오를 수 있을 것인가?!
description.pt-br: Jaeju (significa “habilidade” em coreano) cresceu sem pais em um orfanato com muita habilidade, assim como o nome sugere. Um dia, ele soube que o orfanato estava passando por dificuldades e iria fechar em 3 anos. Enquanto tentava juntar dinheiro para o orfanato, JaeJu recebeu um alerta em seu celular. Nele JaeJu viu um vídeo de si mesmo escalando a torre como um streamer. Sete anos atrás, a torre apareceu de repente e aleatoriamente levou pessoas para lá. Se completar a torre com sucesso e se tornar um “Despertado”, é só questão de tempo até que fique rico!

title.en: My Daughter Is the Final Boss

altTitles.fr: Ma fille est le boss final

altTitles.it: Mia figlia è il boss finale

altTitles.ja: 俺の娘はラスボス

altTitles.zh: 我的女儿是最终的老板

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的女兒是最終的老闆

altTitles.es-la: Mi Hija es el Jefe Final

description.en:
Lee Seojun could only watch as his daughter, the witch Lee Seola, turned into the wicked final boss who destroyed the world and brought upon his death. Though never a good dad, as he loses consciousness, Seojun gets a new quest: "Change the Future." Upon awakening, he sees a 5-year-old Seola standing before him. Now, Seojun must raise Seola to avoid the misfortunes that originally turned her wicked and become the caring father she never had. The price of failure? Only the end of the world.

---
My daughter destroyed the world. At the end of the divergence, I died helplessly. When I opened my eyes again, my five-year-old daughter was in front of me.

*Unique Quest: Changing the Future*
Stop Seol-ah Lee's five misfortunes. (0/5) 

I was given another chance. If I raised her incorrectly, the world will perish.

---

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

title.en: The Blond Yankee and The Punishment Game

altTitles.ja: 金髪ヤンキーと罰ゲーム

description.en:
As part of her punishment game, the transfer student, Shindou Eruko, must talk to the coolest delinquent in the school, which turns out to be Hoshi Natsuki, the blonde delinquent in the class next door. However, she soon found out that Hoshi-kun might not be as scary as he looks...

This manga is Konogi Yoshiru's fantasy take on  [Shingeki no Eroko-san](https://mangadex.org/title/bdfc7777-f1ee-4131-82cb-2fb5861d32e1/shingeki-no-eroko-san-hen-na-oneesan-wa-danshikousei-to-nakayoku-naritai), depicting a setting with Eruko being in the same age as Hoshi-kun. It was later adapted in the main title as Eruko's dream sequence.

Transported back to her first academy days, Nerys Truydd revisits a life marred by betrayal and torment. Exploited and poisoned by her own family and husband, her demise was met with a vow to curse those who wronged her. Now granted a second chance, Nerys vows to rewrite her fate. As she navigates her past, memories of those who hurt her flood back. Determined and fueled by retribution, she seeks to reclaim all she lost. Can she overturn her tragic past and emerge victorious from the shadows of her betrayal?

altTitles.ja: 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる

altTitles.zh: 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦

description.en:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
description.ja:
人気絶頂を誇ったゲームでもその寿命は限られている。実に15年もの歳月を一つのゲームにぶち込んだガチ勢・「淀水アムロ」は、ゲーム内で人生を賭けた一世一代の大博打に挑戦するがあえなく失敗。全てを失い気を失ったアムロが目覚めた所は、リリース初期の15年前だった。回帰前と同じ轍は踏まないと誓うアムロ。全てを知り尽くしたソシャゲ廃人は、最強のニュービーとして蘇る！

description.zh:
沉浸在虚拟游戏中的35岁宅男李煜阳不仅众叛亲离、借贷负债，还在游戏中赌输了唯一能还债的机会，在他绝望之际竟然阴差阳错穿越回了15年前，此时游戏还只是测试版，一切才刚刚开始，借此机会李煜阳想要改变人生，咸鱼翻身，踏上致富之路……凭借着十几年的经验与记忆，他脱下盔甲和内裤，决心站在游戏之巅，单纯地享受这一切！然而这一次，他会走向怎样的未来呢？

description.en: In the realm of historical annals, Chen Xuanqiu, a descendant of a historian, enters the stage to avenge the grudge of Qingping Mountain. Entangling himself in an unresolved matrimonial fate, he steps into the chaos of troubled times. Through numerous strategic maneuvers, Chen Xuanqiu unveils the hypocritical facade of immortals. With unwavering determination, he vows to single-handedly rescue the suffering populace. A mere youth with a solitary sword, a new wind emerges, originating from the depths of Qingping.
description.zh: 史官之子陈玄丘为报青萍山之仇，以未了的姻缘入局，在适逢乱世之中入世。一场又一场的博弈，让陈玄丘看透了神仙的伪善嘴脸，誓以一己之力，拯救天下苍生。一介少年，一人一剑，风生于此，起于青萍。

altTitles.ja: ドロヘドロ

description.en:
This is the story of Kaiman, a guy who does not remember who he was before he was transfigured by a Magic user. 
This transformation left him with a reptile's head, and a desire to find out the truth about who he really is. 
Accompanied by Nikaido, his female companion, he tracks down Magic Users in "The Hole" and unceremoniously 
chomps down on their head, hoping to find out who it was that put him in this state. 
One by one, they witness this "second man" inside the head of Kaiman, and after pulling them back out of his mouth 
he asks them all a question "What did the guy inside my head say?"  


---
description.ru:
В городе, настолько мрачном, что все называют его Дырой, люди живут в постоянном страхе. Воздух и земля пропитаны магическим дымом, и никто уже не удивляется тому, что от выпавшего дождика начнут вдруг прохожие валиться штабелями или городское кладбище превратится в поле битвы людей против зомби. Маги, из-за которых творится вся эта чертовщина, периодически делают вылазки в Дыру и испытывают на жителях свои приёмчики. После одной такой вылазки Никайдо, сборщик трупов, находит огромное бездыханное тело какого-то бедняги с головой крокодила. Кайман (так называет его Никайдо) удаётся выжить, но очнувшись, он понимает, что потерял память. Кайман вместе с Никайдо начинают охоту на магов, чтобы вернуть себе человеческий облик и потерянные воспоминания.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=22562)

description.en: After failing the Grade Nine civil service exam four times and many twists and turns, Han Maru finally succeeded in becoming a special civil servant under the Ministry of Environment. Goodbye, gosiwon! Goodbye, convenience store lunchboxes! But the joy of passing was short-lived. It turned out to be a life-threatening national secret job?! Along with the yellow dust came the demons, creatures that kill and eat humans. The Grade 9 special civil servant job involved waging war against these demons! Han Maru’s life-threatening civil service career begins.

At the threshold of life, a radiant white aura emerges. And… death! Yet, in a twist of fate, the man is once again granted a new life. With a newfound purpose, he sets out to complete his existence as an unfinished “Swordmaster” from his previous life.

The game has turned into reality and a “Great Migration” has occurred all over the Earth. As a top-tier ranker thanks to massive in-game purchases, along with the special privileges from the game administrator “Nel,” I got a new lease on life. I even inherited the inventory of my max-level game character as it was prior to the game shutting down. From cash items that no one else can acquire, to special items of legendary grade that everyone desires! Now, everything that everyone wants unfolds infinitely within my inventory. Please, let it be known to only you! My inventory is… abnormal.

On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

title.en: Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Sono Chiyushi, Jitsu wa Saikyou Nitsuki

altTitles.en: The Healer Who Was Banished From His Party, Is, in Fact, the Strongest

altTitles.ja: パーティーから追放されたその治癒師、実は最強につき

description.en:
A healer gets booted from his party because the leader notices he isn’t really contributing much to the team.

Soon enough, the healer must look for new members to party with. After finding a cute martial artist to work together with, he reveals his secret - while he’s a fairly mediocre healer, he actually fights well in close combat.

Anyway, here’s the story of a support who’s secretly a DPS, and where the entire conflict stems from the fact that he never told his old party he was DPS.
description.pt-br:
Um curandeiro é expulso de sua equipe porque o líder percebe que ele não está contribuindo muito para a equipe.  
O curandeiro deve procurar novos membros para formar uma equipe. Depois de encontrar uma linda artista marcial com quem quer trabalhar, ele revela seu segredo, embora seja um curandeiro medíocre, ele realmente luta bem no combate corpo a corpo.
De qualquer forma, aqui está a história de um suporte que é secretamente um DPS, e onde todo o conflito decorre do fato de que ele nunca disse a sua antiga equipe que era DPS.

altTitles.ja: トーチソング・エコロジー

description.en: The story follows Kiyotake, a man with no aim or accomplishments in life. He’s an actor who lands extra roles at best, works multiple part-time jobs to barely support himself, and has few personal attachments. His best friend Shun died when he was 19 in an accident and he now has a few casual friends. This expands when an old acquaintance moves in next door…

altTitles.ja: お求め頂いた暴君陛下の悪女です

description.en: If I accepted his offer and became his Empress at that time, would I be able to live a little longer? I don’t know but if I had I wouldn’t have felt that pain of dislocating my eye but only when I went 10 years back and stood next to him I realized he fell when I fell we were so much alike which is why he contacted me.

description.en:
Benzo and Soji witnessed the death of Tatsugoro, leader of the Akame Gang. His last words to them were "I'm leaving you two in charge", 
but it was Jinzaburo, the former leader's friend, who was chosen instead. Displeased with the widow's decision, the two left the gang. 
They then set off on an aimless journey, vowing to accomplish something big.  
  
Spin-off of [Saraiya Goyou](https://mangadex.org/manga/24096) featuring Souji the Saint and Benzou the Demon as young men.

A mystery murder case shatters Lan Zhiqing's serene and blissful life into pieces. The past she has long forgotten returns in the form of a nightmarish case, encroaching ever the closer... Shocked, Lan Zhiqing discovers that the most dangerous existence may just be the person she shares a bed with.

altTitles.ja: いとしのニーナ

description.en: One afternoon, Atsushi's best friend from childhood, Masa, informs him, "I kidnapped Niina Aota." Niina, whose popular nickname is "Nina", is the girl Masa fell in love with at first sight on the train attending school. Atsushi found it unexpected and hard to believe, until he heads over to Masa's apartment and discovers that Nina has really been kidnapped….

altTitles.ja: 三代目薬屋久兵衛

description.en:
"I want to believe in my first love.  
But then we met."  
  
25-year-old Miku, who moved back to the house she grew up in two months ago, is studying to succeed her grandfather's Chinese medicine store, "Kusuriya Kyubee." Everyday she and her grandfather respond to the troubles of the customers who visit the store, prepare herbal medicine for them, or simply chat with them.  
  
On the other hand, Miku is unable to forget her first love, but she meets an ultra-shy boy named Kanae who likes plants. Perhaps she is beginning to care about him little by little.

とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

description.en:
19-year-old Shibao Endo, a high school graduate and currently a ronin, suddenly stumbles upon a beautiful young girl dressed in a unique outfit. After being forced to hide her from the pursuing police, he ends up losing his virginity by chance!  
  
The start of exciting and stormy days in Shibao Endo and a delinquent girl's secret love story!  
  
[Preview Chapter 1 (in Japanese) here.](http://www.shonengahosha.co.jp/tachiyomi/ScrollView_pt0005d71d2509fa71/)

遠藤柴生19歳浪人生の前に突然転がり込んできたのは特攻服を着たヤンキーの
美少女。警察から匿ってくれとたのみこまれ、行きずりで童貞を奪われること
に！犬系男子とヤンキー女子のちょっぴりHな秘密のラブストーリ
 
--- 
 
Endō Shiba nama 19-sai rōnin-sei no mae ni totsuzen korogarikonde kita no wa tokkō-fuku o kita yankī no bishōjo. Keisatsu kara kakumatte kure to tanomikoma re, yukizuri de dōtei o ubawa reru koto ni! Inu-kei danshi to yankī joshi no choppiri Hna himitsu no rabusutōri.

description.en:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**
description.fr:
Depuis 3 ans, le ciel de Tokyo est recouvert par un gigantesque vaisseau spatial extra-terrestre. Pourtant, aucune attaque de la part des extra-terrestres n’est recensée, bien que les humains abattent, avec une facilité déconcertante, les petits vaisseaux qui sortent de temps en temps du ventre de l’immense engin…

Pendant ce temps, sur Terre, les deux amies Kadode et Ôran, comme la majorité des humains, ne prêtent plus attention à ce vaisseau et continuent à vivre leur vie. Mais ces 3 années de paix ont endormi la vigilance de l’Humanité… Elle ne remarque pas que « l’envahisseur » s’est infiltré au sein de sa population. Et il pourrait bientôt troubler leur paisible quotidien !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

description.en: Araki is a serious and proper type gay guy. Honest, older men are his type. Even then, the guy who moved in next door is Araki's most hated type, a flashy guy called Higata. That Higata told Araki, "I feel good when I'm with you," and suddenly kissed him. Although he doesn't like him, Araki gets excited--!

Top actress Lee Sia has the ability to see ghosts.
After an accident, she wakes up in the body of 'Camilla Sorfelle'.

But here's the problem.

"Oh, Father, help me!"

This woman's fate always ends in death!

I need to extend my life, so might as well talk to the ghosts first.

Ugh, but why do I keep getting involved with people I want to avoid!?

description.en: Leon was reincarnated in the world of an otome game that he was forced by his sister to conquer just before his death. He tried to live a peaceful life as a mob character, but he encountered a scene where a female student ignored the flow of the story and tried to become the main character. Leon ended up seizing Marie, a girl who had a similar atmosphere to his sister from his previous life, and succeeded in thwarting the scheme. It should have have been the right choice... but why was he feeling uneasy about it?
description.ru:
Леон переродился мобом в мире «отомэ-игры», невольное прохождение которой спихнула на него младшая сестра. Полный отчаяния в мире превосходства женщин, он тем не менее пытается вести спокойную жизнь, нигде не отсвечивая.

В то же время Мария, также переродившаяся в этом мире, строит планы по заполучению положения главной героини и созданию «обратного гарема» с принцем и другими парнями, влюбившихся в неё с первого взгляда, но…

Какая же судьба уготована Леону и Марии, кто сделали лишь один выбор, отличающийся от изначального?!
description.pt-br: Leon foi reencarnado no mundo de um Otome Game que sua irmã o forçou a jogar pouco antes de morrer. Ele tentou viver uma vida pacífica como um personagem secundário, mas acabou encontrando uma cena em que uma estudante feminina ignorou o curso da história e tentou se tornar a personagem principal. Leon acabou capturando Marie, uma garota que tinha uma atmosfera semelhante à de sua irmã de sua vida anterior, e teve sucesso em frustrar o esquema. Deveria ter sido a escolha certa... mas por que ele estava se sentindo inquieto com isso?

In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators, the stories "The Great Chief Returns", "Mansfield Break", "Under Tides", and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans, to help you find the operator who is just right for you!

The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

description.en:
Rai Genji always dreamed of being a top football player, especially one to play for Japan. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai needs to learn and adapt to the constant improvement of everyone else to hone his skills to a professional level. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he fall into the pit of losers.?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock knock-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

description.en:
Kasumi Hana travels to meet her deceased older brother’s penpal, Urushizawa Lily, with the aim to inform her of his passing.

As well as the intent to kill her, if Urushizawa had only been using him.

But when they meet, instead Hana finds a woman who truly loved her late brother, and who has lost her eyesight.

For Lily’s sake, she resolves to take her brother’s place.
A gorgeous Omega transmigrated into a normal society, and he collapsed on the street after getting intoxicated by the pheromone he released.

- In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019)
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)
description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

altTitles.ja: 酩酊の女傭兵ベル。

altTitles.vi: Belle cô lính đánh thuê say xỉn

altTitles.th: ทหารรับจ้างสาวขี้เมา เบล

description.en: A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.

title.en: The Rising of the Commoner-Origin Officer: Beat up All the Incompetent Noble Superiors!

altTitles.ja-ro: Heimin Shusshin no Teikoku Shoukan, Munou na Kizoku Joukan wo Juurin shite Nariagaru

altTitles.ja: 平民出身の帝国将官、無能な貴族上官を蹂躙して成り上がる

description.en:
All the bosses are annoying! The reincarnated strongest magician's trampling and subjugation begins!

Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner. There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. 

However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

An exhilarating upstart fantasy about an unscrupulous superior!

Random short comics of or relating to Genya. Rather than uploading them separately, we've uploaded them all under one title for your convenience. If you like them, please consider showing support for the artist by purchasing the doujinshi or by retweeting/liking the comic. You can find links to the author's Twitter in the comments section or credits page.

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

title.en: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 限界OLと女子大生が〇〇する話

altTitles.en: An OL at Her Limit and a College Girl

description.en: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!
description.ja: 仕事ができて皆から頼られる完璧OL 瀬川さん。しかし家では、汚部屋で毎日コンビニ飯を食べる限界生活を送っていた。ある日、お隣に住む片付け上手でしっかり者の女子大生 安藤さんに部屋の片付けを手伝ってもらうことになり…？

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.ja: ホタルの嫁入り

description.en: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
description.es:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.ja:
令嬢と殺し屋…絶対交わらないはずの二人の、契約結婚ラブサスペンス！
時は明治。
名家に生まれ美貌に恵まれるも、余命わずかと言われている紗都子の唯一の夢は…家の利益になる結婚をすること。
しかし突然、謎の殺し屋に命を狙われ…！？
その場を生き延びるため、紗都子は殺し屋にある“提案”を…！？
description.uk: "Весілля світлячків" – манґа, події якої розгортаються у давні часи епохи Мейджі. Дівчина на ім'я Сатоко, донька заможної родини, якій пощастило успадкувати красу, прагне одружитися з тим, кого запропонує їй батько, але як же це зробити, якщо її життю загрожує хвороба? Одного дня героїня потрапляє до рук викрадачів, де, задля порятунку себе, вона пропонує шлюб власному вбивці. Куди її приведе узгоджений шлюб з людиною, яку вона ніколи не мала зустріти?
description.es-la:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de romance ambientada na era Meiji.  

Nascida em uma família de prestígio e abençoada com boa aparência, Satoko tem uma expectativa de vida curta. Mas de repente, sua vida é alvo de um misterioso assassino...?! Para sobreviver no local, Satoko faz uma "proposta" para o assassino...?! 
- Uma jovem e um assassino... 

Um suspense de amor por contrato de casamento entre duas pessoas que nunca deveriam se encontrar!
description.zh-hk:
千金小姐與殺手…絕對沒有交集的兩個人間的契約結婚愛情喜劇！
時值明治時代。
出生名門又集美貌於一身，卻被告知餘命不久矣的紗都子唯一的夢想是…為了家族的利益而結婚。
但是，突然之間被謎樣的殺手給襲擊了…！？
為了從這種局面中活下來，紗都子向殺手提出了某項“提案”…！？

altTitles.ja: 咲ちゃんは淫魔の子（合掌）

description.en:
Saki-chan, a succubus, has fallen in love with Rokuhara, a son of a temple, of all people. She tries her best to talk to him, but her succubus blood runs wild and she always ends up tempting him. "I wish I could say I love you honestly!"

This is a story about a pure and simple love of a succubus who can't be honest.
description.ja: 「えっちだってだいじょうぶっ教!?」がSNSで大反響！ 待望の第1巻！ 淫魔の咲ちゃんが恋した相手は、よりにもよってお寺の息子の六原くん。頑張って話しかけようとしても淫魔の血が暴走して、ついつい誘惑してしまい――。「素直に好きと言えたらいいのに！」ぽんこつ可愛い淫魔のピュアピュアHな恋の行方は……!? 残念サキュバス×カタブツお寺男子の昇天上等、全力ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

description.en:
Because of her father's debt, 'Lily' lives in the mansion of her father's creditor, 'Rose'. At the mansion where Lily goes with Anna, the only maid she relies on and loves, she meets the attractive Rose...


[NTR Warning]
